languages.text: "Где ты прячешься, еретик? Выйди — поговорим лицом к лицу".

traits.locale_text: "Где ты прячешься, еретик? Выйди — поговорим лицом к лицу".

languages.text: "Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."
languages.original_text: "Где ты прячешься, еретик? Выйди — поговорим лицом к лицу".

traits.locale_text: "Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."
"Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."
"Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."
"Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."
"Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."

languages.text: 「異端者め、どこに隠れている？出てきて面と向かって話せ」
languages.original_text: "Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者め、どこに隠れている？出てきて面と向かって話せ」

languages.text: “你躲在什么地方，异端分子？给我出来，和我当面谈谈。”
languages.original_text: "Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."

traits.locale_text: “你躲在什么地方，异端分子？给我出来，和我当面谈谈。”

languages.text: « Où vous cachez-vous, hérétique ? Montrez-vous, ayez au moins le courage de nous parler face à face. »
languages.original_text: "Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."

traits.locale_text: « Où vous cachez-vous, hérétique ? Montrez-vous, ayez au moins le courage de nous parler face à face. »

languages.text: «¿Dónde te escondes, hereje? Ven, hablemos cara a cara».
languages.original_text: "Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."

traits.locale_text: «¿Dónde te escondes, hereje? Ven, hablemos cara a cara».

languages.text: "Wo versteckt Ihr Euch, Ketzer? Kommt heraus und sprecht mit uns von Angesicht zu Angesicht."
languages.original_text: "Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."

traits.locale_text: "Wo versteckt Ihr Euch, Ketzer? Kommt heraus und sprecht mit uns von Angesicht zu Angesicht."

languages.text: "Nerede saklanıyorsun kâfir? Çık da yüz yüze konuşalım."
languages.original_text: "Where are you hiding, heretic? Come out and speak to us face to face."

traits.locale_text: "Nerede saklanıyorsun kâfir? Çık da yüz yüze konuşalım."
